title: Rilke - 2 - Sonnets to Orpheus - Bert Hellinger

Bert Hellinger reads in German Die Sonette an Orpheus, the theme of which may be described as the unity of death and life in the person of the poet. Added are ABC and BBC features on the poems.

(Kindly seed, and if you can't find a seed for any previous poetry torrent go to the folder 'Current Poetry Torrents' and follow the instructions on the pdf.)
